; Purpose
* [[Property description::Contains the turnover frequency of the product CH4 of an experiment or molecular process. The turnover frequency (TOF) is defined as turnover number per unit time. https://doi.org/10.1021/acscatal.6b00183.@en]]

; Datatype
* [[Has type::Number]].

; Values
* Input fields should be restricted to positive numbers (<nowiki>regexp=/^([0-9]*\.)?[0-9]*$/</nowiki>).

; Unit
* [[Unit::TOF/min]]
